title: The Company of Dogs: Twenty-One Stories by Contemporary Masters
description: A lasting tribute to dogs and a necessary addition to every dog lover's library, this collection features stories by such accomplished contemporary writers as Ann Beattie, Ethan Morden, and Pulitzer Prize-winning Maxine Kumin. The contributors share their love for dogs not only through their marvelous stories, but by donating their profits to agencies providing care for animals.
author: Michael J. Rosen
